name: full-heal
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures any status ailment and confusion.
short_effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text.black-white: A spray-type medicine. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A spray-type medicine. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.
